volunteer_experiences.description: The Youth Activity Committee is organizing activities and events for 500+ junior members (5 - 18 years old) of the hockey association in Weert (HV Weert). I started as a regular member of this committee in 2009, after which I became treasurer in 2012 and chairman in 2014. The committee currently holds 16 members.
